question: In recent times, there is an increasing use of Castor Cake in agriculture. Which among the following is the property of Castor Cake which makes it most suitable for application at the time/ or prior sowing ?
option1: It is a good biofertilizer which makes the soil rich in nitrogen
option2: It is used to amend the soil alkalinity
option3: It has some toxins which control the soil borne pathogens
option4: It helps the soil to retain moisture
answer: It has some toxins which control the soil borne pathogens
explanation: Castor cake is also called as castor meal. Castor cake is an organic by product of castor seed oil production. Castor cake is used as a natural fertilizer.steady nourishment, stimulation, Protection from soil Nematodes and insects. It improves physical, chemical and biological properties of the soil. It has some toxins which control the soil borne pathogens.
